body:
Hi Rob,


thank´s for your advice.


The re-run of "scan for tools" only shows the one EnergyPlus 7.1 installation plus radiance and ruby . There is no other version of anything, this is a complete fresh installation (see my first mail in this thread).


 


Some more infos to the error:


 


---------------- File stdout:


Setting RAYPATH: /usr/local/radiance/lib /usr/local/radiance/bin


Appending PATH: /usr/local/radiance/bin


?ruby -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/1.8? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/1.8/powerpc-darwin12.0? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/1.8/universal-darwin12.0? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/vendor_ruby/1.8? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/vendor_ruby/1.8/universal-darwin12.0? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/vendor_ruby? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/1.8? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/1.8/powerpc-darwin12.0? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/1.8/universal-darwin12.0? -I ?.? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/openstudio? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/lib?  ?./ModelToRad.rb? /private/var/folders/30/8y6hrx_12fs91f5ls6rs38dw0000gn/T/qt_temp.biC335/resources/run/0-Ruby/in.osm ?


no sql file given, running EnergyPlus...


Looking for EnergyPlus at /Applications/EnergyPlus-7-1-0


Found EnergyPlus.


 


failed to run ModelToRad


---------------- End file stdout


 


---------------- File stderr:


./ModelToRad.rb:166:in `create?: Unable to locate file in search paths (RuntimeError)


from ./ModelToRad.rb:166


---------------- End file stderr


 


Any idea what is wrong or missing?


 


Thank you very much


Martin

processed by CONSOLIDATE
